posts.title: Tommy Robinson: In honor of Charlie Kirk & in honor of freedom, on the 13th we march. 🇬🇧🇺🇸. The UK's BIggest FREE SPEECH Festival, Saturday, September 13, London. More important than ever. " Charlie stood for Britain & on the 13th Britain will stand to honour him."

twitter.content: Our free speech event on Saturday is more important than ever. @charliekirk11 being murdered is not a reason to be scared & not to attend , it’s actually the opposite. Charlie stood for me , Charlie stood for Britain & on the 13th Britain will stand to honour him 🇬🇧 🇺🇸. Free
